author: mturk
msg: Added jk_shutdown_socket function, that cracefully closes the AJP
connection by sending FIN. Should help resolving WAIT_CLOSE sockets

author: billbarker
msg: Give up on switching between blocking/non-blocking Sockets, also move the Accecpt into the Poller instead of its own thread.
This is still very much experimental, and nobody should even dream of using it in production.
Testing on Windows, it's very flakey.  On Solaris, it's stable enough, but ChannelSocket is about 25% faster.

author: remm
msg: - It works great (very good performance, seems reliable seen from ab), so attempt to use sendfile by default.
- So far, I haven't seen a socket going to the poller, but as I'm doing localhost testing, it might be normal.
